desc: Shop Lightbox Lab-Grown Diamond Jewelry with up to 50% off earrings, necklaces and bracelets in our Summer Sale! Exclusions apply. Our mission is to make the sparkle of a diamond available for more people, more often. Shop now with up to 50% off for a limited time.

layout.text:
The Summer Sale is here! Get up to 50%* off selected pieces of our lab-grown diamond jewelry.

*Exclusions apply. Read full T&C's for details.
